name: Sparky
description:
Game Description:

1.Take control of a robotic dog named Sparky to complete missions.
2.Explore four unique maps with a total of 100 challenging levels.
3.Encounter various intriguing power-ups and obstacles throughout the game.
4.Easy to pick up and learn the controls within 30 seconds.
5.Compete on the global leaderboard to prove your skills against players worldwide.
6.Embark on an adventure and uncover even more exciting content.
